meanings.definition: The part of the arm between the elbow and the wrist.
meanings.sent1: He flexed his forearms to show off his strength.
meanings.sent2: She wore a bracelet on her forearms.
meanings.sent3: The magician made a rabbit disappear up his forearms!
meanings.sent4: The river snaked through the valley like a pair of forearms.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's forearms were as thick as tree trunks.

meanings.definition: To roll up one's sleeves to prepare for work.
meanings.sent1: Determined to start, he forearms his sleeves and gets to work.
meanings.sent2: She forearms her sleeves before tackling the dirty dishes.
meanings.sent3: The chef forearms his sleeves, ready to conquer the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: He forearms his sleeves, ready to dive into the project head-on.
meanings.sent5: Forearming his sleeves, he was ready to face any challenge ahead.
